CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, page A12 reads: "A Family Affair - This dancing trio is a family affair. The young man in the center is Mike Malone. He is flanked on the left by his aunt, 'Mickey' Bass, and on the right by his mother, Norma Malone. - Harris Photos" Headline reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mothers' 'Smart Affairs of 1961'"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Mickey" Bass and Norma Malone wearing polka dot, one sleeve dance costumes, and Mike Malone wearing tuxedo, posing with arms stretched out, in the Horizon room with leaf patterned carpet and marble baseboard for Junior Mothers' "Smart Affairs of 1961"
